  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  fig.align = 'center',
  results = "asis",
  include = TRUE,
  out.width = "100%",
  knitr.kable.NA = '--',
  knitr.table.format = "html"
)

```

```
